snippet: An aneurysm is being blamed for the death of Cam’ron Matthews, a junior at Alto High in Texas who collapsed during a game Friday night.
abstract: Death of Texas high school football player Cam'ron Matthews, who collapsed during game, is attributed to aneurysm.
lead_paragraph: An aneurysm is being blamed for the death of Cam’ron Matthews, a junior at Alto High in Texas who collapsed during a game Friday night.

headline.main: High School Football Player Died of Aneurysm
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | High School Football; Player Died of Aneurysm
